container.spectrum.rei.enchanting.title: Encantamiento Spectrum
container.spectrum.rei.heating.title: Calentado
container.spectrum.rei.freezing.title: Congelado
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.mi: Creates Lingering Potions - also requires Gunpowder as reagent. Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Bottles
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.sp: Increases Duration by 60 seconds.
1.5x multiplicative boost to Potency, at the cost of Duration. Lowers Yield.
Flat +1 Potency for positive Effects. Colors the Potion in a random color.
1,25x multiplicative Potency bonus.
Provides a huge boost to a random stat.
Triples the Potions duration, but makes the Potion much slower to drink.
Flat +1 to Potency and adds 30 seconds to Duration, but drastically lowers Yield.
Changes all otherwise negative Effects to their positive ones.
Makes the Potion much more smooth, resulting in it being way faster to drink.
Increases Yield, allowing you to brew two additional potions.
Adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable. Also colors it completely black.
Adds a random positive Effect.
Greatly reduces the Potency of negative effects or nullifies them entirely.
Flat +1 Potency for all negative Effects.
Negates the duration penalty for Lingering Potions as well as for Tipped Arrows.
1.2x multiplicative bonus to both Duration and Potency.
75% chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before.
Guaranteed to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before, but at slightly decreased Potency.
Dramatically increases the Potions Potency at the beginning, makes it's potency wear off over time.
Flat +1 Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect. Lowers Yield.
Makes effects not show any particles when active.
Triples the potions Duration at the cost of Potency.
Increases the Duration of positive effects by 120 seconds.
10% chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed before with 2x multiplicative Potency and Duration multiplier.
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.bo: Converts the Potions into Lingering Potions as a single reagent. This way it allows you to directly create Tipped Arrows, too!
Infuses the Potion with a huge amount of additional positive as well as negative, effects, but it's black color also makes it completely unidentifiable. What might you get?
Infuses the Potion with a huge amount of additional - mostly positive - effects, but it's black color also makes it completely unidentifiable. What might you get?
Makes your Potions much more potent, but at a huge loss of duration. If the duration will get too short the potion might end up useless altogether...
Gives a small multiplicative boost to Duration and a tiny chance to add the last brewed effect, too
spectrum.rei.potion_workshop_reacting.he: Increases the Potion's duration by a variable amount. Sometimes more, sometimes less
container.spectrum.bedrock_anvil.tooltip: Irrompible. renombrar gratis, sin limite de
reparación y puede ponerle lore a objetos

spectrum.subtitles.block.sucking_chest.c: Cofre de Agujero Negro se cierra

spectrum.toast.revelation.title: Has ganado conocimiento acerca del mundo
spectrum.toast.revelation.text: Nuevas cosas se revelan ante ti

item.spectrum.upgrade_efficiency2.toolti: Mayor probabilidad de no usar los ingredientes
item.spectrum.upgrade_yield.tooltip: Ligera probabilidad de dar mas objetos
item.spectrum.upgrade_yield2.tooltip: Mayor probabilidad de dar mas objetos
item.spectrum.upgrade_experience.tooltip: Incrementa ligeramente la xp recibida o reduce su consumo
item.spectrum.upgrade_experience2.toolti: Incrementa bastante la xp recibida o recude su consumo
